titleStmt.title: Gods vvaiting to be gracious unto His people together with Englands encouragements and cautions to wait on God. Delivered in certaine sermons at Milk-street in London, by Tho. Case, minister of Gods Word, and lecturer there.
titleStmt.author: Case, Thomas, 1598-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Smith, and are to be sold at his shop in Manchester,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
